import React from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import {Message} from '../Components/Message'; import CheckoutSteps from '../Components/checkoutSteps'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('Order Received') } return ( <>

Order Summary

Shipping

Address: {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.address}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country} {' '}

Payment

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Summary

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your Cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index)=> ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = {item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Price Summary

 Subtotal ${cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)} Shipping Price: ${cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100} Tax Price: ${cart.taxPrice = Number((cart.itemsPrice * 0.15).toFixed(2))} Total: ${cart.totalPrice = cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice}
) }
